0;text-align:right}

sources.utils/normalize.sass:
*,
::before,
::after
  box-sizing: border-box

::before,
::after
  text-decoration: inherit
  vertical-align: inherit

html
  font-family: sans-serif
  line-height: 1.15
  -moz-tab-size: 4
  tab-size: 4
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent
  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%
  word-break: break-word

body,
p
  margin: 0

a
  &:active,
  &:hover
    outline-width: 0

h1
  font-size: 2em
  margin: 0.67em 0

ul
  list-style: none
  padding: 0
  margin: 0

img
  border-style: none

svg:not(:root)
  overflow: hidden

button,
input,
select
  outline: 0
  margin: 0

button
  overflow: visible
  text-transform: none
  -webkit-appearance: button

input
  overflow: visible

::-webkit-input-placeholder
  color: inherit
  opacity: 0.54

::-webkit-search-decoration
  -webkit-appearance: none

::-webkit-file-upload-button
  -webkit-appearance: button
  font: inherit

::-moz-focus-inner
  border-style: none
  padding: 0

::-moz-focusring
  outline: 1px dotted ButtonText

::-moz-ui-invalid
  box-shadow: none

textarea
  margin: 0
  overflow: auto
  resize: vertical
sources.utils/mixins.sass:
=font-face($font-family,$file-path,$weight: normal,$style: normal,$asset-pipeline: false)
  @font-face
    font-family: $font-family
    font-weight: $weight
    font-style: $style
    src: url('#{$file-path}.woff2') format('woff2')
sources.app.sass:
@import "utils/mixins"
@import "utils/normalize"
@import "utils/colors"
@import "fonts"

::selection
  background: #bababa

::-webkit-scrollbar
  width: 8px
::-webkit-scrollbar-track
  background: transparent
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
  background-color: var(--ground)
  border-radius: 10vw
  border-right: .2vw solid var(--background)

html,
body
  height: 100%

body
  font-family: Inter, Helvetica, sans-serif
  font-weight: 300
  font-size: 100%
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  background: var(--background)
  color: #fff
  padding: 0
  overflow: hidden

img
  pointer-events: none
  user-select: none

h2
  font-size: 1.55vw

.app
  position: relative
  width: 100%
  height: 100%
  overflow: hidden
  z-index: 1

.content
  height: 100%
  overflow: hidden
  overflow-y: auto

.grid
  display: flex
  flex-flow: row
  &-column
    flex-flow: column
    &--reverse
      flex-flow: column-reverse
  &-middle
    justify-content: center
  &-right
    justify-content: right
  &-between
    justify-content: space-between
  &-end
    justify-content: flex-end

.link
  font-size: .87vw
  color: var(--blue)
  text-decoration: none
  cursor: pointer
  transition: opacity .25s ease
  &:hover
    opacity: .5
  &-danger
    color: #f00

.page-error
  position: absolute
  top: 50%
  left: 50%
  text-align: center
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
  font-weight: 300
  &__code
    margin: 0
    font-size: 3.2vw
  &__heading
    margin: 0
    font-size: 1.56vw
    padding: 1vw 0 4.5vw

.box
  width: 30%
  min-width: 300px
  padding: 2vw
  margin: 0 auto
  &__content
    background: var(--ground)
    padding: 2vw
    border-radius: 0.9vw
    text-align: center
    overflow: hidden

.btn
  color: #fff
  background: var(--blue)
  width: 100%
  border: 0
  font-size: 1.07vw
  border-radius: 0.6vw
  padding: 0.8vw 0
  cursor: pointer
  text-align: center
  user-select: none
  transition: opacity .25s ease
  &-default
    background: var(--place)
  &:hover
    opacity: .5
  &-mb
    margin-bottom: 15px
  
      
.field__error
  font-size: .75vw
  color: var(--red)
  display: none
  width: 100%
  position: absolute
  right: -1vw
  top: 50%
  transform: translate(100%, -50%)
  &--show
    display: block


@import "layouts/auth.sass"
@import "layouts/modal.sass"
@import "layouts/chat/index.sass"
@import "layouts/profile/index.sass"
sources.layouts/auth.sass:
.auth-form
  &__container
    min-height: 38vh
    padding: .7vw 0 2.8vw
  &__field
    position: relative
    margin: 1.8vw 0
    & .field__error
      right: unset
      left: 0
      top: 100%
      transform: translate(0, 0.1vw)
      text-align: left
  &__label
    position: absolute
    font-size: 1.07vw
    top: 50%
    left: 0
    transform: translateY(-50%)
    color: #999
    pointer-events: none
    transition: all .25s ease
  &__text-input
    width: 100%
    color: #fff
    background: transparent
    border: 0
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--place)
    font-size: 1.07vw
    padding: 0.4vw 0
    transition: border-color .25s ease
    &:focus ~ .auth-form__label,
    &:valid ~ .auth-form__label
      font-size: .72vw
      top: -17%
    &:focus,
    &:valid
      border-color: var(--blue)
  &__callout
    margin-top: 1vw
sources.layouts/modal.sass:
.modal
  position: fixed
  top: 0
  left: 0
  width: 100%
  height: 100%
  pointer-events: none
  opacity: 0
  transition: opacity .25s ease
  background: rgba(0,0,0, .7)
  z-index: 99
  &_active
    pointer-events: all
    opacity: 1
  &__header
    font-size: 1.15vw
    text-align: center
  &-form
    position: fixed
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    width: 27vw
    min-width: 200px
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
    padding: 3vw 2vw 2.2vw
    background: #1E1F21
    border-radius: 12px
    &__field
      position: relative
    &__field-container
      padding: 2.5vw 0 2vw
      & .field__error
        text-align: center
        right: 0
        bottom: -0.4vw
        transform: translate(0,100%)
    &__label
      position: absolute
      font-size: 1.07vw
      top: 50%
      left: 0
      transform: translateY(-50%)
      color: #999
      pointer-events: none
      transition: all .25s ease
    &__text-input
      width: 100%
      color: #fff
      background: transparent
      border: 0
      border-bottom: 1px solid var(--place)
      font-size: 1.07vw
      padding: 0.4vw 0
      transition: border-color .25s ease
      &:focus ~ .modal-form__label,
      &:valid ~ .modal-form__label
        font-size: .72vw
        top: -17%
      &:focus,
      &:valid
        border-color: var(--blue)
sources.layouts/chat/index.sass:
.chat
  position: relative
  width: 100%
  height: 100%
  overflow: hidden
  &__users
    flex: 1
    display: flex
    &__item
      position: relative
      width: 2.5vw
      height: 2.5vw
      margin-left: -1.4vw
      border-radius: 50%
      cursor: pointer
      border: 2px solid var(--place)
      z-index: 1
      &:first-child
        margin: 0
      & img
        width: 100%
      & span
        padding: .5vw 1vw
        background: rgba(0,0,0,.5)
        border-radius: 4px
        position: absolute
        white-space: nowrap
        left: 50%
        bottom: -.4vw
        transform: translate(-50%, 100%)
        transition: opacity .25s ease
        opacity: 0
        pointer-events: none
      &:hover
        z-index: 9
        & span
          opacity: 1
  &-add-btn
    padding: 1vw
  &__sidebar
    display: flex
    flex-flow: column
    width: 24.3%
    border-right: 1px solid var(--place)
  &__content
    position: relative
    flex: 1
    padding: 0 1.6vw
    &--hidden
      display: none
  &__default-message
    position: absolute
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    font-size: .95vw
    color: var(--gray)
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
  &__nav
    padding: .8vw
    text-align: right
    &-link
      padding: 0.8vw 0 0.8vw 0.6vw
      display: inline-block
      font-size: 0.95vw
      text-decoration: none
      color: var(--gray)
      cursor: pointer
      transition: opacity .25s ease
      & svg
        width: .6vw
        height: .8vw
        margin-bottom: -0.1vw
      &:hover
        opacity: .5
    &-search
      padding: 0.8vw 0 0.3vw
  &__header
    position: relative
    padding: .6vw 0
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--place)
    z-index: 9
  &__user
    &-list
      flex: 1
      overflow-y: auto
    &-thumb
      width: 2.65vw
    &-name
      flex: 1
      padding: 0 .7vw
      font-size: 1.07vw
    &-option
      padding: .81vw
      cursor: pointer
      border-radius: 50%
      transition: background .25s ease
      &-dropdown
        position: absolute
        bottom: 0
        right: 0
        transform: translate(.75vw, 110%)
        opacity: 0
        pointer-events: none
        transition: opacity .25s ease
        &-active
          opacity: 1
          pointer-events: all
      & svg
        pointer-events: none
        width: 1.1vw
        height: 1.1vw
        & circle
          transition: fill .25s ease
      &:hover
        background: var(--ground)
        & svg circle
          fill: var(--blue)
  &__body
    flex: 1
    padding: 1vw 0
    overflow-x: hidden
  &__footer
    position: relative
    padding: 0.75vw 0
    border-top: 1px solid var(--place)
  &__media
    background: transparent
    border: 0
    width: 2.6vw
    height: 2.6vw
    padding: 0.35vw
    cursor: pointer
    &-dropdown
      position: absolute
      top: 0
      left: 0
      transform: translate(-.75vw, -110%)
      opacity: 0
      pointer-events: none
      transition: opacity .25s ease
      &-active
        opacity: 1
        pointer-events: all
    & svg
      pointer-events: none
      cursor: pointer
      width: 1.9vw
      height: 1.9vw
    & svg path
      transition: fill .25s ease
    &:hover svg path
      fill: var(--blue)
  &__text
    flex: 1
    padding: 0 .7vw
    &-input
      width: 100%
      height: 100%
      background: var(--ground)
      border: 0
      color: #fff
      border-radius: 10vw
      padding: 0 1.4vw
      font-size: 1vw
      &::placeholder
        user-select: none
  &__send
    position: relative
    border-radius: 50%
    width: 2.2vw
    height: 2.2vw
    border: 0
    background: var(--blue)
    transition: opacity .25s ease
    cursor: pointer
    & svg
      position: absolute
      width: 1.05vw
      height: 1.05vw
      top: 50%
      left: 50%
      transform: translate(-43%, -50%)
      pointer-events: none
      & *
        transition: all .25s ease
    &:hover
      opacity: .5
      & path
        stroke: #fff
      & rect
        fill: #fff
  &__message
    position: relative
    max-width: 45%
    min-width: 13%
    margin: .5%
    padding: 1% 1.5% 2%
    border-radius: 0 1.3vw 1.3vw
    font-size: 1.07vw
    & .timestamp
      position: absolute
      right: .4vw
      bottom: .4vw
      padding: 0.15vw 0.4vw
      border-radius: 1vw
      background: var(--ground)
    &_type
      &_text
        background-color: var(--ground)
      &_other
        border-radius: 1.3vw
        padding: 0
        flex: none
        background-color: var(--ground)
        overflow: hidden
        & img
          display: block
          width: 100%
      &_other .timestamp
        background-color: var(--gray-2)
    &_owner
      align-self: flex-end
      border-radius: 1.3vw 1.3vw 0
    &_status_viewed .timestamp::before
      content: url(../../assets/images/status-viewed.svg)

@import "search-form.sass"
@import "user-list.sass"
@import "dropdown.sass"
sources.layouts/chat/search-form.sass:
.search-form
  width: 100%
  &__input
    width: 100%
    background-color: var(--ground)
    background-image: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
    background-repeat: no-repeat
    background-position: 3% 50%
    background-size: 1.6vw
    border: 0
    color: #fff
    font-size: 0.95vw
    border-radius: 0.4vw
    padding: 0.85vw 2.65vw 0.75vw
    &::placeholder
      text-align: center
sources.layouts/chat/user-list.sass:
.user
  position: relative
  padding: 0.45vw 0
  cursor: pointer
  &::before,
  &::after
    content: ""
    position: absolute
    left: 50%
    width: 93%
    transform: translateX(-50%)
    border-top: 1px solid var(--place)
    display: none
  &::before
    top: 0
  &::after
    display: block
    bottom: -1px
  &:first-child
    &::before
      display: block
  &__link
    padding: .6vw 0.8vw
    color: #fff
    height: 5vw
    text-decoration: none
    user-select: none
    transition: background .25s ease
    &:hover
      background: var(--gray-2)
  &__active
    & .user__link
      background: var(--gray-2)
  &__photo
    pointer-events: none
    width: 16%
    &-img
      width: 100%
  &__content
    pointer-events: none
    padding: 0 .8vw
    flex: 1
  &__name
    font-size: 1vw
    font-weight: 500
    padding-bottom: 0.3vw
  &__info
    pointer-events: none
    text-align: right
  &__message
    font-size: .95vw
    color: var(--gray)
    &-time
      font-size: .7vw
      color: var(--gray)
    &-count
      font-size: .8vw
      padding: .35vw 0
      width: 1.5vw
      height: 1.5vw
      border-radius: 100%
      background: var(--blue)
      display: block
      text-align: center
sources.layouts/chat/dropdown.sass:
.dropdown
  &__list
    position: relative
    border-radius: .8vw
    background: var(--ground)
    padding: .5vw 0
    overflow: hidden
  &__item
    padding: .5vw 1.2vw
    font-size: .95vw
    display: flex
    align-items: center
    cursor: pointer
    user-select: none
    transition: background .25s ease
    & img
      margin-right: 1vw
    &:hover
      background: var(--gray-2)
sources.layouts/profile/index.sass:
.profile
  width: 100%
  height: 100%
  &__sidebar
    width: 5vw
    border-right: 1px solid var(--place)
  &__backlink
    position: relative
    height: 100%
    cursor: pointer
    transition: opacity .25s ease
    &-btn
      position: absolute
      top: 50%
      left: 50%
      width: 2vw
      height: 2vw
      border-radius: 50%
      background: var(--blue)
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
      text-align: center
      & svg
        width: 1.05vw
        height: 1.05vw
        margin: 0 auto
        transform: scale(-1, -1)
        & *
          transition: all .25s ease
    &:hover
      opacity: .5
      & path
        stroke: #fff
      & rect
        fill: #fff
  &__content
    flex: 1
    padding: 5vw 0 6vw
    overflow: hidden
    overflow-y: auto
  &__container
    width: 42%
    margin: 0 auto
  &__photo
    position: relative
    width: 10vw
    height: 10vw
    margin: 0 auto
    border-radius: 50%
    margin-bottom: 1.4vw
    overflow: hidden
    &-action
      position: absolute
      font-size: 1.07vw
      width: 100%
      padding: 0 1vw
      top: 50%
      left: 50%
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%)
      text-align: center
      opacity: 0
      cursor: pointer
      user-select: none
      pointer-events: none
      transition: opacity 0.25s ease
      z-index: 9
    &__change
      cursor: pointer
      &::before
        content: ''
        position: absolute
        width: 100%
        height: 100%
        top: 0
        left: 0
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)
        opacity: 0
        transition: opacity .25s ease
      &:hover
        & .profile__photo-action
          opacity: 1
        &::before
          opacity: 1
    & img
      width: 100%
      height: 100%
      pointer-events: none
   
  &__fullname
    font-size: 1.3vw
    font-weight: 500
    text-align: center
  &__info
    padding: 3.7vw 0 0
  &__action-item
    padding: .8vw 0
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--place)
    &:last-child
      border-bottom: 0
  &__save
    width: 22vw
    margin: 0 auto
  &__action
    padding-top: 3.5vw

.field-file
  text-align: center
  color: #3369F3
  padding-bottom: 25px
  cursor: pointer
  text-decoration: underline
  &:hover
    text-decoration: none
  &__input
    display: none

@import form.sass
sources.layouts/profile/form.sass:
.profile-form
  &__field
    position: relative
    display: flex
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--place)
    &:last-child
      border-bottom: 0
  &__label
    display: flex
    flex-flow: column
    justify-content: center
    font-size: 1.07vw
    width: 15vw
  &__text-input
    border: 0
    background: transparent
    color: var(--gray)
    flex: 1
    font-size: 1.07vw
    padding: 0.8vw 0
    text-align: right
